Description: Hieratic papyrus with a Late Egyptian Miscellany, recto cols. 3-5: 2.4-3.2 'The idle scribe'; 3.2-4.1 'Serve Amun and he will reward you'; 4.2-7 'Compliments to a high official'; 4.8-11 'Report on a mission to Elephantine'; 4.12-5.5 'Longing for memphis'; 5.6-12 'Letter of adulation to Pharaoh'. Late Egyptian Miscellanies
Curator's comments: Miscellany Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies Vernus, Revue d'Egyptologie 37, p. 144-145 [11, 4].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380655) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380655)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B
